vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Asher living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.37;
son of: Zophah (H6690);
brother of: Suah (H5477), Harnepher (H2774), Shual (H7777B), Beri (H1275), Imrah (H3236), Bezer (H1221H), Shamma (H8037H), Shilshah (H8030), Ithran (H3506H) and Beera (H0878)
§ Hod = "splendour"
one of the sons of Zophah, among the descendants of Asher
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (1)   majestad; (2)   hijo de Sofah; tribu de Aser
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
河得 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "光輝"
亞設的後裔, 瑣法的兒子 (代上 7:37)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
河得 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "光辉"
亚设的后裔, 琐法的儿子 (代上 7:37)
